tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_measurements (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL,
    body_fat DECIMAL,
    measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_body_measurements (
    user_id UUID,
    height DECIMAL,
    waist_circumference DECIMAL,
    measurement_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, measurement_date)
);

CREATE TABLE BodyMeasurements (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INTEGER,
    height DECIMAL,
    waist_size DECIMAL,
    measurement_date DATE
);
